title: Establishment of trust accounts
context: ยง352-18 Establishment of trust accounts. All sums collected pursuant to sections 352-16 and 352-17, and from other authorized sources shall be placed in a bank trust account or federally insured savings account to the credit of persons committed pursuant to this chapter. The director or director&rsquo;s agent shall maintain individual ledger accounts for each committed person and shall issue each person a periodic statement showing deposits and withdrawals.
